revision.comment: Omega moved page [[Freebox Crystal 1 F-ADSL05R]] to [[Freebox Crystal 1 (F-ADSL05R)]]
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Free |model=Freebox Crystal |revision=1 (F-ADSL05R) |asin= |est_release_date=01/2013 |is_manuf=No |manuf=Freebox SA |availability=now |type=wireless router, dsl modem, VoIP phone, |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6348;BCM6348KPBG; |cpu1_cspeed=256 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=SST |fla1_model=SST39VF3201-70-4C-EKE |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4S641632K-UC60 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_module=SparkLAN WMIR-269GN |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2880;RT2880F; |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2820 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6061;88E6061-LAJ1; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=ADSL2+, DECT, VoIP, |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |oui=14:0C:76 |oui_eth=00:07:C8 }} {{TagLine|Freebox Crystal 1 Internet Box}} :[http://www.free.fr/adsl/ Product page]
Released in 2013, the ''Freebox Crystal 1'' (ref F-ADSL05R) :is a refresh of the ''Freebox 5'' (last released in 2008).
{{See also|Freebox 6 Revolution (F-GW06250A)}}
*[https://fr.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Freebox ''Freebox'' on '''Wikipedia'''] (FR)
